# Test case that verifies we have a fix for github.com/govim/govim/issues/688

vim ex 'e main.go'
vim ex 'w'

-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"log"
	"time"
)

func main() {
    for {
    time.Sleep(time.Second*5)

	log.Println("History:")
	for _, h := range []string{"a","b"} {
		log.Printf("%s",h)
		for i := range []int{} {
			log.Printf("%v",i)
		}
	}
}
}
